[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cerbos/hub](./hub.md)

## hub package

Client library for interacting with [Cerbos Hub](https://www.cerbos.dev/product-cerbos-hub) from server-side Node.js applications.

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CannotModifyGitConnectedStore](./hub.cannotmodifygitconnectedstore.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown when attempting to modify a store that is connected to a Git repository.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ConditionUnsatisfied](./hub.conditionunsatisfied.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown when a store modification is rejected because the condition specified in the request wasn't met.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MissingCredentials](./hub.missingcredentials.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown on failure to load credentials from environment variables.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[NoUsableFiles](./hub.nousablefiles.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown when [`StoresClient.replaceFiles()`](./hub.storesclient.replacefiles.md) fails because the request didn't contain any usable files.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[OperationDiscarded](./hub.operationdiscarded.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown when a store modification is aborted because it doesn't change the state of the store.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[StoresClient](./hub.storesclient.md)


</td><td>

A client for interacting with policy stores in Cerbos Hub.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ValidationFailure](./hub.validationfailure.md)


</td><td>

Error thrown when a store modification is rejected because it contains invalid files.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
